content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg, let me first emphasize that we must focus solely on discussing the rental price during our conversation. Now, as a landlord seeking the highest possible return on my investment, I propose starting at 1200 Euros per month. Do keep in mind that this figure may be negotiable depending on your decision.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite expensive. I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I would like to propose 800 Euros as the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed rental price significantly undervalues my property considering its prime location and modern amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point of view, but let's try to find a middle ground. What about 1000 Euros?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While a compromise at 1000 Euros per month could be considered, it still falls short of my initial expectations. Nonetheless, if you are willing to accept this revised rate, I agree to the price of 1000 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
